alert.note: Alert for Eastern Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 7:53AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...STRONG SOUTHEASTERLY WINDS EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... Southeasterly winds will quickly increase Sunday morning across the eastern Aleutians ahead of a front associated with a strong area of low pressure in the western Bering. Gusty winds of 55 to 70 mph are possible early Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening as the front moves through the region. Winds will then slowly diminish through the overnight hours. Winds are expected to be generally light through Monday as the low passes through the region. Gusty northwesterly winds are then expected to develop by early Tuesday morning with gusts of 50 to 65 mph possible through Tuesday evening. People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. For more information visit http://weather.gov/afc
